item.title:
Video Editor for Faceless YouTube Channel
- Upwork
item.description:
Overview:

We are seeking a skilled and creative video editor to join our team in producing engaging content for our faceless YouTube channel. As a video editor, you will play a crucial role in crafting visually compelling videos that captivate our audience. This position offers an exciting opportunity to work with a dynamic team and contribute to the growth and success of our channel.

Responsibilities:

Edit raw footage into polished, high-quality videos that align with our brand and content strategy.

Enhance videos with graphics, animations, effects, and other visual elements to enhance viewer engagement.

Ensure seamless transitions, audio synchronization, and overall video coherence.

Collaborate with the content team to brainstorm and develop creative concepts for video projects.

Meet deadlines and deliver completed videos according to project requirements.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a video editor, with a strong portfolio showcasing your editing skills and creative abilities.

Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.

Excellent understanding of video editing techniques, including pacing, storytelling, and visual aesthetics.

Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment and adapt to evolving project needs.

Strong communication skills and attention to detail.
Knowledge of YouTube best practices and trends is a plus.

How to Apply:

If you are passionate about video editing and eager to contribute to the success of a growing YouTube channel, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio/demo reel, and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you are the ideal candidate for this position. Additionally, include any links to YouTube channels or videos you have edited. We look forward to reviewing your application!

Location: Remote

Duration: Long-term, ongoing

Budget: $15/video

We are excited to welcome a talented video editor to our team and collaborate on creating exceptional content for our faceless YouTube channel. Apply now and join us on this exciting journey!








Posted On: June 23, 2024 04:06 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, YouTube Marketing, Videography, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: MP4, YouTube Marketing, Videography, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Japan
click to apply

item.title:
Voiceover Artist for Faceless YouTube Channel
- Upwork
item.description:
Overview:

We are seeking a talented and versatile voiceover artist to join our team in providing engaging narration for our faceless YouTube channel. As a voiceover artist, you will bring scripts to life with your captivating voice and infuse our videos with personality and emotion. This position offers an exciting opportunity to collaborate with a dynamic team and contribute to the success and growth of our channel.

Responsibilities:

Record high-quality voiceovers that match the tone, style, and mood of our video content.

Interpret scripts and deliver compelling performances that engage and captivate our audience.

Provide multiple takes and variations to ensure options for editing and post-production.

Collaborate closely with the scriptwriting and video editing team to ensure seamless integration of voiceovers into final videos.

Follow project guidelines, deadlines, and specifications to deliver polished voiceover recordings.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a voiceover artist, with a strong portfolio showcasing your vocal range and versatility.

Exceptional speaking and pronunciation skills with clear articulation and modulation.

Ability to convey emotion, personality, and authenticity through voice acting.

High-quality recording equipment and a quiet recording environment to produce professional-grade audio.

Ability to take direction and adapt to project requirements and feedback.

Knowledge of YouTube best practices and trends is a plus.

How to Apply:

If you are passionate about voice acting and eager to contribute to the success of a growing YouTube channel, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume, voiceover demo reel or samples, and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you are the perfect fit for this position. Additionally, include any links to YouTube channels or videos you have provided voiceovers for. We look forward to reviewing your application!

Location: Remote

Duration: Long-term, ongoing

Budget: $10/video

Join our team and help us deliver captivating and memorable voiceovers for our faceless YouTube channel. Apply now and be part of our exciting journey!







Hourly Range: $20.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 04:05 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Authoritative Tone, Corporate Tone, Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Audio Editing, US English Dialect, Middle-Aged Adult, Male, Female, Narration
Skills: Authoritative Tone, Corporate Tone, Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Audio Editing, US English Dialect, Middle-Aged Adult, Male, Female, Narration
Country: Japan
click to apply

item.title: Thumbnail Artist for Faceless YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:

We are searching for a talented and creative thumbnail artist to join our team in designing eye-catching thumbnails for our faceless YouTube channel. As a thumbnail artist, you will play a crucial role in attracting viewers and increasing click-through rates by creating compelling visual representations of our video content. This position offers an exciting opportunity to collaborate with a dynamic team and contribute to the success and growth of our channel.

Responsibilities:

Design visually appealing and attention-grabbing thumbnails that accurately represent our video content and entice viewers to click.

Incorporate branding elements, text, and imagery to create thumbnails that stand out in search results and suggested videos.

Utilize graphic design software and tools to create high-quality thumbnails optimized for various platforms and devices.

Stay updated on YouTube trends, best practices, and algorithm changes to ensure thumbnails are optimized for maximum visibility and engagement.

Collaborate closely with the video editing and production team to ensure thumbnails complement the overall branding and messaging of our channel.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a graphic designer or thumbnail artist, with a strong portfolio showcasing your design skills and creativity.

Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or Canva.

Strong understanding of visual composition, color theory, typography, and branding principles.

Ability to interpret video content and create thumbnails that effectively convey its essence and attract viewers' attention.

Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively in a remote team environment.

Knowledge of YouTube SEO and thumbnail optimization techniques is a plus.

How to Apply:

If you are passionate about graphic design and eager to contribute to the success of a growing YouTube channel, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio showcasing thumbnail designs, and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you are the perfect fit for this position. Additionally, include any links to YouTube channels or videos you have created thumbnails for. We look forward to reviewing your application!

Location: Remote

Duration: Long-term, ongoing

Budget: Competitive, based on experience

Join our team and help us create visually stunning thumbnails that drive engagement and growth for our faceless YouTube channel. Apply now and be part of our exciting journey!








Posted On: June 23, 2024 04:05 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Photoshop, Illustration, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing, YouTube, Adobe After Effects, YouTube Marketing, Logo Design
Skills: Graphic Design, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Photoshop, Illustration, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing, YouTube, Adobe After Effects, YouTube Marketing, Logo Design
Country: Japan
click to apply

item.title: News Clips Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for an editor who is able to create explainer videos on geopolitics.

*The budget will be $30/video, but we want the videos quick and fast, so you can earn up to $500 within the month.

Here is a reference video:
https://youtu.be/R6P5A_OBa6o

You must be able to:
- source high quality clips and interviews
- work with a given script and voiceover
- attention to detail in selecting clips that best suit the part of the script
- weave in interviews and soundbites to enhance the story
- create simple graphics similar to the reference video.
- edit music properly to create a flow

If you have read through the post, please indicate your favourite animated video/ad/film. (we will ignore anyone who does not include this)

NOTE:
- No agencies.
- We go by a project cost instead of hourly cost.
- Please indicate if you have a revision limit.
- Please also include in your post if there's anything else you need to inform us (e.g. commitments, work time, etc.)

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 23, 2024 03:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor Needed for True Crime YouTube Channel (Bodycam Niche) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to join our content creation team which focuses on the true crime niche, specifically bodycam footage.

This role includes:
-    Raw Footage Editing: Insert raw bodycam footage clips into videos. This task is straightforward but requires attention to detail
-    Subtitle Creation: transcribe and insert subtitles for the bodycam footage
-    Evidence board creation, to structure the cases and explain them (please check the competition channel Ex-Cop to see what we are talking about)

Videos will be 30 minutes long on average, with 3 to 4 cases per video and there will be 3 videos per week to edit.

We want to model this type of edit from the channel Ex-Cop:  https://www.youtube.com/@X-Cop/videos

Please watch some of their videos. The videos will need to be in the same style as the channel above.
  
Requirements:
1. Follow the same editing format as the channel “Ex-Cop”
2. Reasonable turnaround time
3. In-depth research and accurate information
4. Willing to work long-term and grow with the team
5. MUST ATTACH EXAMPLES OF YOUR PREVIOUS SCRIPT WRITING WORK
6. Fast response times
7. Good understanding of storytelling, YouTube Retention and the Crime Niche

I would like to see examples of work you have done before. PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DON’T HAVE PREVIOUS EXPERIENCE IN THIS NICHE.

What We Offer:
- Flexible working hours.
- Opportunity to be part of a growing and long-lasting team within the YouTube space, with over 3 years of experience and continuous project expansion.
- Growth potential and to take on more work within the team.
- A long-term position with no end date, aiming for a lasting collaboration.

Did you add samples? (if not don't apply)
Do you have over 90% job success? (if not don't apply)
Do you have earned more than $100? (if not don't apply)

Final compensation will depend on the editor's ability to create subtitles in addition to their editing skills. We offer per-minute pay, with different rates for raw footage editing and voice-over segment editing, based on the quality of the work.

To make you read the job offer this far, please begin your proposal by sharing with me your favourite fruit!

—------------------



Budget: $30
Posted On: June 23, 2024 03:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Demo Video for New Tool - Upwork
item.description:
LOCATION: CORVALLIS, OREGON, USA **locals only to apply**

We need a product demo video for our new patented tool. This will be posted on our website in preparation for applying for a booth at SEMA.

We will want the video to be ~1 to 1.5 minutes long, including:
- intro from the inventor (~15 sec)
- ladder rack tool being attached to the tool, loaded on the truck and strapped down (~30sec)
- footage of secure load on road and rough terrain (~15 sec) (drone footage needed)
- OPTIONAL: 3-D footage of the tool

I can write the creative brief and talking points for any talking heads or voice-overs. The video will be taken at a local Home Depot.

We need this video turned around WITHIN A WEEK of the project start date.

LOCATION: CORVALLIS, OREGON, USA **locals only to apply**

We need a product demo video for our new patented tool. This will be posted on our website in preparation for applying for a booth at SEMA.

We will want the video to be ~1 to 1.5 minutes long, including:
- intro from the inventor (~15 sec)
- ladder rack tool being attached to the tool, loaded on the truck and strapped down (~30sec)
- footage of secure load on road and rough terrain (~15 sec) (drone footage needed)
- OPTIONAL: 3-D footage of the tool

I can write the creative brief and talking points for any talking heads or voice-overs. The video will be taken at a local Home Depot.

We need this video turned around WITHIN A WEEK of the project start date.
